name: User_StartMenu_startup
pattern: {"query": "select f.path,f.directory,u.username,f.hard_links,f.symlink,datetime(f.btime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as btime, datetime(f.atime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as atime, datetime(f.ctime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as ctime, datetime(f.mtime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as mtime from file f LEFT JOIN users u on f.uid=u.uid where f.path like 'C:\\users\\%\\AppData\\Roaming\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Start Menu\\Programs\\Startup\\%' AND f.type='directory';", "interval": 1860, "description": "Check suspicious directory creation under Roaming\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Start Menu\\Programs\\Startup - ATT&CK T1060,T1023", "platform": "windows", "removed": false}
